languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт качает головой и тихо шепчет:{/n} "Взращивать связь, чтобы принести ее в жертву, убить отца, чтобы занять его место. Страх перед тем, что вам кажется слабостями, и есть ваша главная слабость, ведущая в темный тупик духа".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт качает головой и тихо шепчет:{/n} "Взращивать связь, чтобы принести ее в жертву, убить отца, чтобы занять его место. Страх перед тем, что вам кажется слабостями, и есть ваша главная слабость, ведущая в темный тупик духа".

languages.text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head and whispers quietly,{/n} "To foster a bond just to sacrifice it in the end. To kill your father just to assume his place. Your kind's fear of what you perceive as weakness is, in truth, your greatest weakness of all — one that leads your spirit into a trap with no escape."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet sacude la cabeza y susurra:{/n} «Fomentar un vínculo solo para sacrificarlo al final. Matar a su padre para asumir su cargo. El miedo de su especie a lo que percibe como debilidad es, en realidad, su mayor debilidad: la que lleva a su espíritu a una trampa sin escapatoria».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head and whispers quietly,{/n} "To foster a bond just to sacrifice it in the end. To kill your father just to assume his place. Your kind's fear of what you perceive as weakness is, in truth, your greatest weakness of all — one that leads your spirit into a trap with no escape."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet sacude la cabeza y susurra:{/n} «Fomentar un vínculo solo para sacrificarlo al final. Matar a su padre para asumir su cargo. El miedo de su especie a lo que percibe como debilidad es, en realidad, su mayor debilidad: la que lleva a su espíritu a una trampa sin escapatoria».

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは頭を横に振り、静かに囁いた。{/n}「絆を育み、最後にはそれを犠牲にする。父を殺すのは、その座につくためだ。お前の種族が弱さとして認識するものへの恐怖は、実際に、お前の最大の弱さであり、お前の精神を逃げ場のない罠へと導くものである」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head and whispers quietly,{/n} "To foster a bond just to sacrifice it in the end. To kill your father just to assume his place. Your kind's fear of what you perceive as weakness is, in truth, your greatest weakness of all — one that leads your spirit into a trap with no escape."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは頭を横に振り、静かに囁いた。{/n}「絆を育み、最後にはそれを犠牲にする。父を殺すのは、その座につくためだ。お前の種族が弱さとして認識するものへの恐怖は、実際に、お前の最大の弱さであり、お前の精神を逃げ場のない罠へと導くものである」

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特摇了摇头，轻声开了口。{/n}“你们培养出情感的纽带，仅仅是为了到最后将其牺牲。你杀死了你的父亲，仅仅是为了取代他的位置。你们惧怕你们所谓的弱点，但实际上，这种恐惧才是你们最大的弱点，它会将你们的灵魂诱入无法挣脱的陷阱。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head and whispers quietly,{/n} "To foster a bond just to sacrifice it in the end. To kill your father just to assume his place. Your kind's fear of what you perceive as weakness is, in truth, your greatest weakness of all — one that leads your spirit into a trap with no escape."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特摇了摇头，轻声开了口。{/n}“你们培养出情感的纽带，仅仅是为了到最后将其牺牲。你杀死了你的父亲，仅仅是为了取代他的位置。你们惧怕你们所谓的弱点，但实际上，这种恐惧才是你们最大的弱点，它会将你们的灵魂诱入无法挣脱的陷阱。”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet schüttelt den Kopf und flüstert leise: {/n} "Ihr schmiedet Bande, um sie am Ende zu opfern. Ihr tötet Euren Vater, um seinen Platz einzunehmen. Eure Angst vor dem, was Ihr als Schwäche erachtet, ist in Wahrheit Eure größte Schwäche ... eine Schwäche, die Euren Geist in eine Falle führt, aus der es kein Entkommen gibt."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head and whispers quietly,{/n} "To foster a bond just to sacrifice it in the end. To kill your father just to assume his place. Your kind's fear of what you perceive as weakness is, in truth, your greatest weakness of all — one that leads your spirit into a trap with no escape."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet schüttelt den Kopf und flüstert leise: {/n} "Ihr schmiedet Bande, um sie am Ende zu opfern. Ihr tötet Euren Vater, um seinen Platz einzunehmen. Eure Angst vor dem, was Ihr als Schwäche erachtet, ist in Wahrheit Eure größte Schwäche ... eine Schwäche, die Euren Geist in eine Falle führt, aus der es kein Entkommen gibt."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet secoue la tête et murmure doucement :{/n} « Cultiver un lien dans le seul but de le sacrifier. Tuer votre père afin de prendre sa place. La crainte que nourrit votre espèce face à ce que vous percevez comme une faiblesse est en soi votre plus grande faiblesse, une faille qui précipite votre esprit dans un piège dont on ne réchappe pas. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head and whispers quietly,{/n} "To foster a bond just to sacrifice it in the end. To kill your father just to assume his place. Your kind's fear of what you perceive as weakness is, in truth, your greatest weakness of all — one that leads your spirit into a trap with no escape."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet secoue la tête et murmure doucement :{/n} « Cultiver un lien dans le seul but de le sacrifier. Tuer votre père afin de prendre sa place. La crainte que nourrit votre espèce face à ce que vous percevez comme une faiblesse est en soi votre plus grande faiblesse, une faille qui précipite votre esprit dans un piège dont on ne réchappe pas. »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, başını iki yana sallayarak hafifçe fısıldıyor.{/n} "En nihayetinde feda edecek olsan da sahip olduğun bağı güçlendirmek, sırf yerini almak için babanı öldürmek... Soyunun zayıflık olarak algıladığı şeye karşı korkusu, aslında en büyük zayıflığı... Ruhunuzu kaçışı olmayan bir tuzağa sürüklüyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head and whispers quietly,{/n} "To foster a bond just to sacrifice it in the end. To kill your father just to assume his place. Your kind's fear of what you perceive as weakness is, in truth, your greatest weakness of all — one that leads your spirit into a trap with no escape."
